Capelo

Magento - e-commerce

Visit live

Hats with the
taste...

Technology

  • Custom Development
  • User interface / UX

Capelo.gr is an e-shop with a large selection of hats, jockeys,
beanies and accessories for every style.

Famous brands at the best prices in an e-shop with easy navigation,
fast search engine and advanced filters.

Capelo is a top online luxury fashion destination with 4.000.000 visitors per month and worldwide shipping.

The website features designer clothes, shoes and accessories for men and women from the most prestigious fashion designers such as Alexander McQueen, Balmain, Chloe, Dior, Dsquared, Dolce and Gabbana, Givenchy, Lanvin, Rick Owens, Roberto Cavalli, Saint Lauren.
